com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2DepthVarianceRendererType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceUsableType, R2DeletableType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2DepthVarianceRenderer

    public interface R2DepthVarianceRendererType
extends R2DeletableType
    The type of renderers that populate depth variance buffers.
